attributes.description: Name of the Reference Model publisher.
attributes.name: rm_publisher

attributes.description: Name of the package in whose reachability graph the `_rm_class_` class is found (there can be more than one possibility in many reference models).
attributes.name: rm_package

attributes.description: Name of the root class of this archetype.
attributes.name: rm_class

attributes.description: The short concept name of the archetype as used in the multi-axial `_archetype_hrid_`.
attributes.name: concept_id

attributes.description: The full numeric version of this archetype consisting of 3 parts, e.g. `"1.8.2"`. The `_archetype_hrid_` feature includes only the major version.
attributes.name: release_version

attributes.description: The status of the version, i.e.:
attributes.name: version_status

attributes.description: The build count since last increment of any version part.
attributes.name: build_count

functions.meaning: The 'interface' form of the HRID, i.e. down to the major version.
functions.name: semantic_id

functions.meaning: The 'physical' form of the HRID, i.e. with complete version information specified by `_version_id()_`.
functions.name: physical_id

functions.meaning: Full version identifier string, based on `_release_version_`, `_version_status_`, and `_build_count_` e.g. `"1.8.2-rc.4"`.
functions.name: version_id

functions.meaning: Major version of this archetype, extracted from `_release_version_`.
functions.name: major_version

functions.meaning: Minor version of this archetype, extracted from `_release_version_`.
functions.name: minor_version

functions.meaning: Patch version of this archetype, extracted from `_release_version_`. Equivalent to patch version in patch version in `semver.org` sytem.
functions.name: patch_version

meta_info.description: Human-readable structured identifier (HRID) for an archetype or template.
meta_info.name: ARCHETYPE_HRID
